title: Pythagorean Theorem
text: We will use the Pythagorean Theorem to find the distance. The Pythagorean theorem allows us to relate two distances to get a third distance. The theorem states that $$c^2=a^2+b^2$$, where c is the hypotenuse and a, $$b$$ are the non-hypotenuse sides.
